cz.zcu.kiv.multicloud.oauth2

Class OAuth2Token

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.zcu.kiv.multicloud.oauth2.OAuth2Token
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class OAuth2Token
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    cz.zcu.kiv.multicloud.oauth2/OAuth2Token.java

    Generic OAuth 2.0 token class. It is able to hold Bearer token as described in OAuth 2.0 specification. It is also capable of storing MAC token as described in current draft of the OAuth 2.0 MAC Tokens.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jaromír Staněk
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
